name: postcss-gradient
description: PostCSS plugin Magically creates an SVG-background-image from a gradient  forr better browser support (IE9), furthermore a background-color is added as basic IE8E8 and earlier fallback (e.g. to avoid white color on white background as neither linear-gradient nor the SVG ar shown)
